64346.en:
<voice 00130_00064346><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Ho ho! I see you've come. I was hoping you
would, as I have a favor to ask.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64346.ja:
<voice 00130_00064346><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ほおっ　<pc>！　来てくれたか。
　ちーと　頼みたいことがあって
　そなたを　探していたんじゃよ。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64346.ko:
<voice 00130_00064346><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 오옷, <pc>! 와 주었군.
　살짝 부탁할 일이 있어서
　그대를 찾았다네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64346.zh-Hans:
<voice 00130_00064346><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>哦，<pc>！你来了啊。
我刚好有事想找你帮忙，
正在找你呢。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64346.zh-Hant:
<voice 00130_00064346><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>喔，<pc>！你來啦。
我剛好有事想找你幫忙，
正在找你呢。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64347.en:
<voice 00170_00064347><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>As a matter of fact, I've... I've figured
out to return back to normal!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64347.ja:
<voice 00170_00064347><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「じつはな　なんと……
　元の姿に戻る方法が　判明したんじゃよ！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64347.ko:
<voice 00170_00064347><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 사실은 말일세, 글쎄……
　원래 모습으로 돌아갈 방법을 찾았다네!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64347.zh-Hans:
<voice 00170_00064347><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>其实啊，我说了你不要吃惊……
我已经找到能变回原来样子的方法了！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64347.zh-Hant:
<voice 00170_00064347><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>實不相瞞……
我已經找到恢復原本模樣的方法了！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64348.en:
<voice 00210_00064348><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>According to an ancient manuscript, there
is a sacred spring located in a place called
Jyra Jungle. It can break powerful curses!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64348.ja:
<voice 00210_00064348><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「我が国に伝わる　古文書によると
　強力な　へんげの呪いを解く　聖なる泉が
　ジャイラ密林という場所にあるらしい。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64348.ko:
<voice 00210_00064348><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 우리 왕국에 전해지는 고문서에 따르면
　강력한 변신의 저주를 푸는 성스러운 샘이
　자이라 밀림이라는 곳에 있다고 하네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64348.zh-Hans:
<voice 00210_00064348><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>根据我国流传的古书记载，在一个
叫加伊拉密林的地方，有一种神圣的泉水，
能解除强力的变形诅咒。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64348.zh-Hant:
<voice 00210_00064348><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>根據我國流傳下來的古書記載，
在一個名叫加伊拉密林的地方，
有神聖的泉水能夠解除強力變形詛咒。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64349.en:
<voice 00240_00064349><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>The spring is called the Kudus Spring.
If you dowse yourself in its waters, it will
instantly wash away any curse...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64349.ja:
<voice 00240_00064349><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「その名も　クドゥスの泉じゃ。
　そこに　身をひたせば　かかった呪いが
　たちまち　はらわれるという……。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64349.ko:
<voice 00240_00064349><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 그 이름은 바로 쿠두스 샘이라네.
　그곳에 몸을 담그면 저주가
　금세 사라진다더군…….<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64349.zh-Hans:
<voice 00240_00064349><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>那口泉的名字叫库托斯之泉。
据说只要将身体泡在泉水里，
立刻就能解除身上的诅咒……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64349.zh-Hant:
<voice 00240_00064349><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>那口泉水的名字叫做庫托斯之泉。
據說只要泡在泉水裡，
就能立刻解除身上的詛咒……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64350.en:
<voice 00280_00064350><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>I will not be able to go about my kingly
affairs if I am to remain like this. I must
become human again as soon as possible.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64350.ja:
<voice 00280_00064350><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「この姿のままじゃと　国事をとりおこなうにも
　支障をきたすのでな。一刻も早く
　人間の姿を　取り戻さねばならぬのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64350.ko:
<voice 00280_00064350><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 이 모습으로는 나랏일을 하기에도
　지장이 많아서 말일세. 한시라도 빨리
　인간의 모습을 되찾아야 하네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64350.zh-Hans:
<voice 00280_00064350><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>如果我一直是这副样子，
处理国家大事时也会有很多的不便。
我一定要变回人类的样子。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64350.zh-Hant:
<voice 00280_00064350><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>畢竟我要是一直保持這個模樣，
處理國事時會有許多不便。我必須盡早
變回人類。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64351.en:
<voice 00310_00064351><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Normally, I'd have my soldiers come along
with me, but only a few know my true
identity.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64351.ja:
<voice 00310_00064351><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「本来なら　城の兵士と　ジャイラ密林へ行き
　クドゥスの泉を　探すところじゃが
　ワシの　この姿を知る者は　限られておる。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64351.ko:
<voice 00310_00064351><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 평소 같으면 성의 병사와 자이라 밀림에 가서
　쿠두스 샘을 찾겠지만 이런 내 모습을
　아는 자는 한정되어 있어서 말일세.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64351.zh-Hans:
<voice 00310_00064351><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>本来我是应该和城里的士兵一起
去加伊拉密林寻找库托斯之泉的，
但是知道我变成这个样子的人只有少数几个。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64351.zh-Hant:
<voice 00310_00064351><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>本來我應該和城裡的士兵一起
去加伊拉密林尋找庫托斯之泉，
但是知道我變成這個樣子的只有少數人。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64352.en:
<voice 00350_00064352><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Caboose agreed that it would be a good idea
if someone capable like you were to escort
me, since you already know the situation.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64352.ja:
<voice 00350_00064352><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「そこで　事情を知り　ウデも立つ　おぬしが
　護衛についてくれれば　よいだろう……と
　カブース大臣も　オッケーしてくれたんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64352.ko:
<voice 00350_00064352><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 그래서 사정을 알고 실력도 있는 자네가
　호위로 함께 가 주면 되겠다……며
　카브스 대신도 승낙해 주었다네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64352.zh-Hans:
<voice 00350_00064352><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>你既知道事情经过，又本领不凡，
所以我想让你来担任我的护卫……
卡布斯大臣也同意这样做。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64352.zh-Hant:
<voice 00350_00064352><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>於是我想拜託知情又身手不凡的你
來當我的護衛……
卡布斯大臣也同意了。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64353.en:
<voice 00380_00064353><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Well? Will you escort me to Kudus Spring?
It's located in the Jyra Jungle, northwest
of Defel Desert.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64353.ja:
<voice 00380_00064353><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「どうじゃ？　デフェル荒野の北西にある
　ジャイラ密林の　クドゥスの泉まで
　ワシの護衛を　頼めんかのう？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64353.ko:
<voice 00380_00064353><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 어떤가? 데펠 황야 북서쪽에 있는
　자이라 밀림의 쿠두스 샘까지
　내 호위를 맡아 주겠나?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64353.zh-Hans:
<voice 00380_00064353><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>怎么样？能拜托你保护我去
位于德菲尔荒野西北的
加伊拉密林里的库托斯之泉吗？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64353.zh-Hant:
<voice 00380_00064353><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>怎麼樣？
能護送我到位於德菲爾荒野西北，
加伊拉密林裡的庫托斯之泉嗎？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26333.en:
You've been asked to do a request. Do you accept?
<select>
Accept
Decline
<select_end><close>
26333.ja:
クエストを　依頼されました。
このクエストを　受けますか？
<select>
うける
やめる
<select_end><close>
26333.ko:
퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.
이 퀘스트를 수락하겠습니까?
<select>
수락하기
그만두기
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hans:
对方委托了任务。
要接受这个任务吗？
<select>
接受
放弃
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hant:
對方提出了任務委託。
是否要承接這件任務？
<select>
承接
放棄
<select_end><close>

64354.en:
<voice 00445_00064354><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Ooh, that's the spirit! I was right to place my trust
in you for this request.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64354.ja:
<voice 00445_00064354><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「おおっ。そうこなくっちゃ　じゃ！
　おぬしを見込んで　頼んでみて　よかったわい。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64354.ko:
<voice 00445_00064354><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 오옷, 그래야지!
　자네에게 부탁하길 잘했군.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64354.zh-Hans:
<voice 00445_00064354><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>就等着你这么回答呢！
我相信找你帮忙是对的。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64354.zh-Hant:
<voice 00445_00064354><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>喔喔！這就對了！
我就知道找對人幫忙了。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

64355.en:
<voice 00510_00064355><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>In that case, I'll stealthily & stickily stay behind
you. Then, at once, let's be on our way!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64355.ja:
<voice 00510_00064355><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「そういうことで　ワシは　おぬしのあとを
　コッソリ　ジットリ　つけていくぞよ。
　では　さっそく　出発じゃ！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64355.ko:
<voice 00510_00064355><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 그럼 난 자네의 뒤를
　몰래 촉촉하게 따라가겠네.
　그럼 바로 출발하세!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64355.zh-Hans:
<voice 00510_00064355><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>我会悄悄地、紧紧地
跟在你后面的。
那我们就赶快出发吧！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64355.zh-Hant:
<voice 00510_00064355><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>我會悄悄地緊緊跟在
你後面。
我們趕緊出發吧！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64356.en:
<voice 00705_00064356><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Ah, thank you, but... It seems you already
have your hands quite full with other
requests right now.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64356.ja:
<voice 00705_00064356><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「おお。ありがたや……と　言いたいところじゃが
　おぬし　他の者からの頼まれごとで
　手が　いっぱいのようじゃな。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64356.ko:
<voice 00705_00064356><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 오오, 고맙……네만
　자네, 다른 이들의 부탁 때문에
　여유가 없어 보이는군.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64356.zh-Hans:
<voice 00705_00064356><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>哦哦，太好了……我虽然想这么说，
但是看来你已经从其他人那里
接受很多委托了。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64356.zh-Hant:
<voice 00705_00064356><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>喔，謝謝你……不過你已經
從其他人那邊接了
太多委託。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64357.en:
<voice 00735_00064357><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Please take care of those first, but hurry
back. I'll be waiting.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64357.ja:
<voice 00735_00064357><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「それらを　速やかに片付けて
　急いで　戻ってまいるのじゃ。
　ワシ　ここで待っておるからの。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64357.ko:
<voice 00735_00064357><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 그것들부터 신속히 처리하고
　빨리 돌아오게나.
　난 이곳에서 기다리겠네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64357.zh-Hans:
<voice 00735_00064357><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>你迅速去把那些事解决了之后，
就赶紧回到这里来吧。
我在这里等你。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64357.zh-Hant:
<voice 00735_00064357><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>去迅速解決那些事情，
然後趕緊回來吧。
我就在這裡等你。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66966.en:
<voice 00930_00066966><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>You... Won't...? I didn't think my benefactor could
be so heartless...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
66966.ja:
<voice 00930_00066966><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「なん……じゃと……？　ワシの恩人が
　そんな　非情なヤツじゃったとは……。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
66966.ko:
<voice 00930_00066966><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 뭐……라고……? 나의 은인이
　이토록 매정한 자였을 줄이야…….<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
66966.zh-Hans:
<voice 00930_00066966><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>你说……什么？
没想到我的恩人竟是这样无情的家伙……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
66966.zh-Hant:
<voice 00930_00066966><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>你說……什麼……！？沒想到我的恩人，
居然是那麼無情的人……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66967.en:
<voice 00960_00066967><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>But I shall wait here. I will hope that you will change
your mind.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
66967.ja:
<voice 00960_00066967><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「でも　ワシ　おぬしの気が変わるのを
　信じて　ここで待っておるからな。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
66967.ko:
<voice 00960_00066967><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 하지만 난 자네의 마음이 바뀌리라
　믿고 여기서 기다리겠네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
66967.zh-Hans:
<voice 00960_00066967><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>但是我相信你会改变主意的，
我等着你。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
66967.zh-Hant:
<voice 00960_00066967><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>不過，我相信你會改變主意的，
我等你。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64358.en:
<voice 00130_00064358><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>! I knew you'd come back. You have
a strong sense of responsibility, I can tell!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64358.ja:
<voice 00130_00064358><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「おおっ　<pc>！
　責任感の強い　おぬしのことじゃから
　必ずや　また　来てくれると信じておったぞ。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64358.ko:
<voice 00130_00064358><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 오옷, <pc>!
　책임감이 강한 자네라면
　반드시 다시 와 주리라 믿고 있었네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64358.zh-Hans:
<voice 00130_00064358><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>哦，<pc>！
你责任感很强，
我相信你一定会回来的。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64358.zh-Hant:
<voice 00130_00064358><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>很好，<pc>！
我就知道責任感特別強的你
一定會回來找我的。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64359.en:
<voice 00170_00064359><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>According to ancient manuscripts, powerful shapeshifting
curses can be broken in a sacred spring northwest of
Defel Wilderness in a place called Jyra Jungle...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64359.ja:
<voice 00170_00064359><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「古文書によると　強力な　へんげの呪いを解く
　聖なる泉が　デフェル荒野の北西に存在する
　ジャイラ密林という場所に　あるらしい……。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64359.ko:
<voice 00170_00064359><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 고문서에 따르면 강력한 변신의 저주를 푸는
　성스러운 샘이 데펠 황야 북서쪽의
　자이라 밀림이라는 곳에 있다더군…….<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64359.zh-Hans:
<voice 00170_00064359><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>根据古书记载，能解除强力变形诅咒的
神圣泉水在德菲尔荒野西北的
一个叫加伊拉密林的地方……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64359.zh-Hant:
<voice 00170_00064359><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>根據古書記載，
在德菲爾荒野西北邊的加伊拉密林，
有神聖的泉水能夠解除強力變形詛咒……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64360.en:
<voice 00200_00064360><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Its name is Kudus Spring. I want you to take me
there.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64360.ja:
<voice 00200_00064360><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「その名も　クドゥスの泉。
　その泉まで　ワシを連れていってほしいんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64360.ko:
<voice 00200_00064360><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 그 이름은 바로 쿠두스 샘.
　그 샘까지 날 데려가 줬으면 하네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64360.zh-Hans:
<voice 00200_00064360><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>泉的名字叫库托斯之泉，
请带我去泉水那里。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64360.zh-Hant:
<voice 00200_00064360><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>那口泉水的名字叫做庫托斯之泉。
請帶我到泉水那邊去。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64361.en:
<voice 00240_00064361><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>I believe that if I bathe myself in Kudus Spring, the
shapeshifting curse will be lifted and I will return
to human form. Please, won't you do it?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64361.ja:
<voice 00240_00064361><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「クドゥスの泉に　身をひたせば　へんげの呪いが
　解けて　人間の姿に戻れると思うでの。
　どうじゃ　やってくれんかの？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64361.ko:
<voice 00240_00064361><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 쿠두스 샘에 몸을 담그면 변신의 저주가
　풀려서 인간의 모습으로 돌아갈 걸세.
　어떤가, 도와주겠나?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64361.zh-Hans:
<voice 00240_00064361><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>只要把身体泡在泉水里
就可以解除诅咒了。
怎么样？愿意帮我吗？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64361.zh-Hant:
<voice 00240_00064361><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>只要泡在庫托斯之泉的泉水裡，
就能解除變形詛咒，讓我恢復成人類。
怎樣？願意幫我嗎？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64362.en: <voice 00130_00064362><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>No? What is it, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64362.ja: <voice 00130_00064362><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ぬっ？　どうした　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64362.ko: <voice 00130_00064362><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 음? 왜 그러나, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64362.zh-Hans: <voice 00130_00064362><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>嗯？怎么了，<pc>？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64362.zh-Hant: <voice 00130_00064362><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>嗯？怎麼了？<pc>。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64363.en:
<voice 00170_00064363><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>I want you to take me to that spring. It's
somewhere in the Jyra Jungle, which is
northwest of Defel Desert.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64363.ja:
<voice 00170_00064363><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「おぬしには　デフェル荒野の北西の
　ジャイラ密林のどこかにあるという
　クドゥスの泉まで　連れていってほしいんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64363.ko:
<voice 00170_00064363><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 자네는 데펠 황야 북서쪽의
　자이라 밀림 어딘가에 있다는
　쿠두스 샘까지 날 데려가 줘야지.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64363.zh-Hans:
<voice 00170_00064363><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>我希望你能带我去
位于德菲尔荒野西北的
加伊拉密林里的库托斯之泉。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64363.zh-Hant:
<voice 00170_00064363><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>我希望你帶我到庫托斯之泉，
它就在德菲爾荒野西北部的
加伊拉密林。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64364.en:
<voice 00202_00064364><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>If the ancient texts are to be believed,
then a short dip in the spring should
break the curse and make me human again!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64364.ja:
<voice 00202_00064364><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「古文書の通りならば　そのクドゥスの泉に
　身をひたせば　へんげの呪いが　解けて
　人間の姿に戻れるはず！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64364.ko:
<voice 00202_00064364><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 고문서의 내용으로는 쿠두스 샘에
　몸을 담그면 변신의 저주가 풀려서
　인간의 모습으로 돌아갈 걸세!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64364.zh-Hans:
<voice 00202_00064364><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>如果古书里记载的内容是真的，
只要将身体泡在库托斯之泉里，
我就能解除变形诅咒，变回人类的样子！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64364.zh-Hant:
<voice 00202_00064364><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>要是古書的記載屬實，只要泡在
庫托斯之泉的泉水裡，
就能解除變形詛咒，讓我恢復成人類。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64365.en:
<voice 00252_00064365><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Come on, let's be on our way! Don't worry,
I will follow closely behind you and stay
out of sight.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64365.ja:
<voice 00252_00064365><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ささっ　<pc>。出発じゃ！
　心配せんでも　ワシは　おぬしの後ろを
　ヒッソリ　ジットリ　ついていくからの。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64365.ko:
<voice 00252_00064365><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 자, <pc>. 출발하세!
　걱정하지 않아도 난 자네의 뒤를
　몰래 촉촉하게 따라가겠네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64365.zh-Hans:
<voice 00252_00064365><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>快点，<pc>。我们出发吧！
你不用担心我，我会悄悄地、
紧紧地跟在你身后的。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64365.zh-Hant:
<voice 00252_00064365><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>好了！<pc>，出發吧！
不用擔心我，我會悄悄地、
緊緊地跟在你身後。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64366.en:
<voice 00250_00064366><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Ho...! This must be the Kudus Spring! It certainly has a
mysterious aroma!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64366.ja:
<voice 00250_00064366><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ふぉ……！　ここが　かのクドゥスの泉じゃな。
　確かに　神秘的なニオイが　プンプンするぞい！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64366.ko:
<voice 00250_00064366><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 호오……! 여기가 바로 쿠두스 샘인가.
　확실히 신비한 향이 진동을 하는군!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64366.zh-Hans:
<voice 00250_00064366><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>哦……这里就是库托斯之泉啊。
的确是强烈地散发出一股神秘的气息！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64366.zh-Hant:
<voice 00250_00064366><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>哇……！這裡就是庫托斯之泉啊。
的確是散發出一股神祕的氣息！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64367.en: <voice 00465_00064367><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Now... Let us see if my curse can truly be lifted.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64367.ja:
<voice 00465_00064367><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「さて……。本当に　呪いが解けるかどうか
　確かめねばならんのう。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64367.ko:
<voice 00465_00064367><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 자……. 정말로 저주가 풀릴지
　확인해 볼까.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64367.zh-Hans:
<voice 00465_00064367><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>好……来试试看
这里是不是真的能解除诅咒吧。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64367.zh-Hant:
<voice 00465_00064367><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>好……來試試看它是不是真的
能解除詛咒吧。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64368.en:
<voice 00635_00064368><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001><pc>, if anything unexpected occurs, I'll
be counting on you...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64368.ja:
<voice 00635_00064368><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「<pc>。ワシに　もしものことがあったら
　よろしく　頼んだぞ……。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64368.ko:
<voice 00635_00064368><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: <pc>. 내게 만일의 사태가 생기면
　잘 부탁하네…….<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64368.zh-Hans:
<voice 00635_00064368><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001><pc>，如果我出了什么意外，
你要救我啊……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64368.zh-Hant:
<voice 00635_00064368><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001><pc>，如果我出了什麼意外，
你要救我喔……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64369.en: <voice 01015_00064369><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Hmm... Nothing's happening.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64369.ja: <voice 01015_00064369><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ふむ。……何も　起こらんな。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64369.ko: <voice 01015_00064369><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 흠. ……아무 일도 일어나지 않는군.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64369.zh-Hans: <voice 01015_00064369><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>嗯……什么事也没有发生啊。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64369.zh-Hant: <voice 01015_00064369><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>嗯……什麼事也沒發生啊。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64370.en:
<voice 01115_00064370><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001><pc>... We celebrated too soon, it seems.
Kudus Spring had no effect...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64370.ja:
<voice 01115_00064370><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「<pc>……。
　これは　ぬかよろこびだったようじゃ。
　クドゥスの泉には　なんの効果も……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64370.ko:
<voice 01115_00064370><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: <pc>…….
　아무래도 헛된 기대였나 보군.
　쿠두스 샘에는 아무런 효과도……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64370.zh-Hans:
<voice 01115_00064370><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001><pc>……
看来我是空欢喜了一场啊。
库托斯之泉什么效果也没……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64370.zh-Hant:
<voice 01115_00064370><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001><pc>……
看來是空歡喜一場了。
庫托斯之泉什麼效果都沒有……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64371.en: <voice 01225_00064371><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>H...Hmm!? What is this...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64371.ja:
<voice 01225_00064371><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ん……んん！？
　なんじゃ　これは……。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64371.ko:
<voice 01225_00064371><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 음……? 으음!?
　이건 뭐지…….<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64371.zh-Hans:
<voice 01225_00064371><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>嗯……嗯？
怎么回事……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64371.zh-Hant:
<voice 01225_00064371><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>嗯……嗯嗯！？
怎麼回事……？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64372.ja: <voice 01305_00064372><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ぎゃああああああ！！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64372.zh-Hans: <voice 01305_00064372><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64372.zh-Hant: <voice 01305_00064372><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64373.ja: <voice 01625_00064373><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「ふぉっ！　こ　これは……。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64373.ko: <voice 01625_00064373><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: 헉! 이, 이건…….<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64373.zh-Hans: <voice 01625_00064373><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>哦！这、这是……<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64373.zh-Hant: <voice 01625_00064373><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>哇……！這、這是……<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64374.en: <voice 01900_00064374><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>It worked! I'm back to normal!!<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64374.ja:
<voice 01900_00064374><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「やったぞい！！
　元の姿に　戻れたぞよ！<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64374.ko:
<voice 01900_00064374><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: 성공일세!!
　원래 모습으로 돌아왔어!<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64374.zh-Hans:
<voice 01900_00064374><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>成功了！
我变回了原来的样子！<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64374.zh-Hant:
<voice 01900_00064374><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>成功了！！
我變回原來的樣子了！<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64375.en:
<voice 01950_00064375><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Well, what do you think? Huhuhuhu...
You probably had no idea such a handsome
face hid under all that sliminess, did you?<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64375.ja:
<voice 01950_00064375><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「どうじゃ？　<pc>。ふっふふー♪
　前の　ヌメヌメした姿からは
　想像がつかないほどの　イケメンじゃろう？<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64375.ko:
<voice 01950_00064375><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: 어떤가? <pc>. 후후후~♪
　미끌거리던 모습에서는
　상상도 못할 만큼 잘생기지 않았나?<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64375.zh-Hans:
<voice 01950_00064375><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>怎么样？<pc>，呵呵呵♪
从我之前那个滑溜溜的样子，
你完全想象不到我原来长得这么帅吧？<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64375.zh-Hant:
<voice 01950_00064375><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>怎麼樣？<pc>。呵呵呵♪
從之前那個滑溜溜的樣子，
你完全想不到我原來長得這麼帥，對吧？<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000091.en: <voice 01951_29000091><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Wow... You really were a person.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000091.ja: <voice 01951_29000091><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「うわ……ホントに人だったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000091.ko: <voice 01951_29000091><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 우와…… 진짜 사람이었구나.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000091.zh-Hans: <voice 01951_29000091><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>呜哇……还真的是人呢。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000091.zh-Hant: <voice 01951_29000091><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>嗚哇……還真的是人呢。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000092.en: <voice 01952_29000092><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Not much has changed.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000092.ja: <voice 01952_29000092><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「あんまり　変わんねーなー。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000092.ko: <voice 01952_29000092><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 별로 달라진 게 없는데.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000092.zh-Hans: <voice 01952_29000092><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>没什么差别嘛。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000092.zh-Hant: <voice 01952_29000092><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>沒什麼差別嘛。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000093.en: <voice 01953_29000093><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>Almost as shaggy as before, isn't he.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000093.ja: <voice 01953_29000093><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「もしゃもしゃの　まんまですね。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000093.ko: <voice 01953_29000093><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 덥수룩한 건 똑같네요.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000093.zh-Hans: <voice 01953_29000093><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>一样是全身蓬蓬的样子啊。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000093.zh-Hant: <voice 01953_29000093><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>一樣是全身蓬蓬的樣子啊。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64376.en:
<voice 01980_00064376><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Wahoo! I'm not a monster anymore! With that, I'm...
I'm...<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64376.ja:
<voice 01980_00064376><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「むほー！　ワシは　もうバケモノじゃない！
　これで　ワシは　ワシはっ……。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64376.ko:
<voice 01980_00064376><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: 에잇~! 난 이제 괴물이 아닐세!
　이로써 난, 나는…….<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64376.zh-Hans:
<voice 01980_00064376><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>哈哈！我已经不是怪物了！
这下我、我……<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64376.zh-Hant:
<voice 01980_00064376><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>嗯哼！我已經不是怪物了！
這下子，我、我……<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64377.en: <voice 02110_00064377><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>...Only I have returned back to normal.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64377.ja: <voice 02110_00064377><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「……ワシだけが　戻ってしまった。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64377.ko: <voice 02110_00064377><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: ……나만 혼자 돌아오고 말았군.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64377.zh-Hans: <voice 02110_00064377><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>……就只有我一个人变回来了。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64377.zh-Hant: <voice 02110_00064377><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>……只有我一個人變回來了。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64378.en:
<voice 02170_00064378><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>As King, only I... Only I could have
caused so much suffering due to my ineptitude...<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64378.ja:
<voice 02170_00064378><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「国王である　ワシだけが……。
　ワシが　ふがいないせいで
　皆に　苦しい思いをさせたというのに……。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64378.ko:
<voice 02170_00064378><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: 국왕인 나만…….
　내가 부족했던 탓에
　모두를 힘들게 만들었건만…….<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64378.zh-Hans:
<voice 02170_00064378><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>就只有我这个国王一个人……
都是因为我不中用
才让大家留下那么痛苦的回忆……<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64378.zh-Hant:
<voice 02170_00064378><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>就只有身為國王的我……
明明是我不中用害得其他人受苦，
卻只有我一個人恢復原狀……<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64379.en:
<voice 02260_00064379><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Those soldiers led by Gorius, and the
Monster Masters sent to war... Where in
the world were they taken?<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64379.ja:
<voice 02260_00064379><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「ゴリウス兵士長に　率いられた兵士たちと
　戦争に駆り出された　まもの使いたち……
　彼らは　どこに　連れ去られたんじゃろうか。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64379.ko:
<voice 02260_00064379><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: 고리우스 병사단장 휘하의 병사들과
　전쟁에 차출된 마물 조련사들……
　그 사람들은 어디로 끌려갔을는지.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64379.zh-Hans:
<voice 02260_00064379><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>格利乌斯士兵长率领的士兵们
和被逼上战场的驯魔师们……
他们都被带到哪里去了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64379.zh-Hant:
<voice 02260_00064379><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>格利烏斯士兵長率領的那批士兵、
和被逼上戰場的馴魔師們，
不知道他們被帶去哪裡了……<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64380.en:
<voice 02320_00064380><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>I want to find them, and bring them to
this spring to return them all to normal...
I must find them somehow.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64380.ja:
<voice 02320_00064380><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「あの者たちも　この泉に連れてきて
　人間の姿に　戻してやりたいのう……。
　なんとか　探しだしてやらねば。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64380.ko:
<voice 02320_00064380><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: 그 사람들도 이 샘으로 데려와
　인간의 모습을 되찾게 해 주고 싶군…….
　어떻게든 찾아야 해.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64380.zh-Hans:
<voice 02320_00064380><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>我想把他们也带到这里来，
让他们变回人类的样子……
我一定要找到他们。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64380.zh-Hant:
<voice 02320_00064380><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>我想把他們都帶來這裡，
讓他們變回人類……
我一定要找到他們。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64381.en:
<voice 02460_00064381><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Thank you for your assistance! Please come
to the throne room when you return to
Arahaghiro. I'd like to reward you!<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64381.ja:
<voice 02460_00064381><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>「<pc>！　ご苦労じゃった。
　アラハギーロへ戻ったら　玉座の間まで
　来てくれんか。礼がしたいんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64381.ko:
<voice 02460_00064381><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>: <pc>! 수고가 많았네.
　아라하길로에 돌아가면 옥좌의 방으로
　와 주겠나? 답례를 하고 싶네.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64381.zh-Hans:
<voice 02460_00064381><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001><pc>！辛苦你了。回到艾拉哈奇罗之后，
你可以到王座大厅来一下吗？
我想把谢礼给你。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64381.zh-Hant:
<voice 02460_00064381><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001><pc>！辛苦你了！
回到艾拉哈奇羅之後，
可以來王座之間一趟嗎？我想要答謝你。<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>
